short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analytics and Search Console dark theme (Pure CSS Injection)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My eyes hurt when checking Google Search Console and Google Analytics at night. So I created this simple utility to inject some dark theme CSS into the GA and GSC pages.

Highlights:

1. It will follow your system's dark/light settings. It won't force your GA and GSC pages to become dark when you don't want it.

2. It will mark the "<html>" element as black, so even if you're opening the pages for the first time, your eyes won't be hurt by the flash of a blank white screen.

3. Everything in this extension is purely some CSS code. No JS involved. It's super safe. No extra permission needs!
